RT @GretaThunberg This is what it’s all about. And yet, basically no one has even seen these figures. We need to communicate this everywhere over and over again. Let’s get started. https://twitter.com/peters_glen/status/1205449629527166976 QT @Peters_Glen How big is the CO₂ bucket for 1.5°C?

Well, the bucket is about to overflow in a few short years, unless we:
1. Turn off the tap (urgently)
2. Put a hole in the bottom to remove CO₂ (negative emissions)

The medical device tax hurts patients and stifles medical innovation. Repealing this tax is critical to keeping American health care companies—like Utah's @MeritMedical and @GEhealthcare—globally competitive. Congress must #RepealDeviceTax before it resumes in January.

Under Medicare for All you will never lose health coverage, even if you:

-Are low-income
-Leave your job
-Turn 26
-Move to another state
-Have a pre-existing condition
-Get laid off
-Get divorced
-Retire early

RT @katieporteroc A reminder that @ewarren plan to cancel student debt will help families broadly, not just younger voters. Get this:

3 million Americans over the age of 60 also have outstanding student debt and more than 40,000 seniors have their social security checks garnished to repay student debt.
